'''Theo Village''' is a village where the [[w:Protagonist|protagonist]] of [[Minecraft: The Manga|Minecraft: the Manga]], [[Nico White]], lived until the age of ten. It first appears in [[Minecraft: The Manga Volume 1|the first book of the series]] in Chapter One “''Nico’s Adventure Begins''”, page five.
